channel.title: Quests [delta]
channel.description: I'm trying to add my own quests, so how do I make quests that you need items for. Like a man at lumbridge requesting 10 cooked shrimp, and 5 raw shark. (I haven't seen any tutorials :/)

item.title: Quests [delta]
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

i made a new topic, i figured it out

Read full topic

item.title: Quests [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:8, topic:386836”]I was outside hangin with a friend, I’ll start it now.

Edit: in my quest tab all my quests are there like it shows the name cooks assistant, like all the quests are in there. but I just gotta do something with em to make em work so how do i do that[/quote]
Again, use integers…

Read full topic

item.title: Quests [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:6, topic:386836”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=482605.msg3534469#msg3534469 date=1300467914]
You don’t need tutorials, just common sense.

Set integers for each stage of the quest.

For example:

if(questOne == 0) { addItem(1, 90); questOne = 1; }

Also you will need to make a new token for this so it saves permanatly.

[/quote]
I see, I know what you’re getting at, thanks for giving help and not spoonfeeding, just what I like. So I’d use my item like if my player has this item then delete and whatnot. Thanks.

Edit: I think I’ll make Cook’s Assistant.[/quote]
Thats the way to go, start off simple, then work your way up

Read full topic

I’m trying to add my own quests, so how do I make quests that you need items for. Like a man at lumbridge requesting 10 cooked shrimp, and 5 raw shark. (I haven’t seen any tutorials :/)

if (hasitem(blablabla, bla) {
//code
}

?
[/quote]
Fixed[/quote]

Read full topic
